actions.text: Amendment SA 2622 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

Amendment SA 2622 proposed by Senator Kohl to Amendment SA 2620. (consideration: CR S1620-1621; text: CR S1620-1621) To amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to require the provision of a child safety lock in connection with the transfer of a handgun.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2622 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2622 proposed by Senator Kohl to Amendment SA 2620.

amends_amendment.purpose: To amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to require the provision of a child safety device in connection with the transfer of a handgun and to provide safety standards for child safety devices.

purpose: To amend chapter 44 of title 18, United States Code, to require the provision of a child safety lock in connection with the transfer of a handgun.
